entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Rodney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:28 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ridgetown 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Temperature: 4.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.6°C
Wind: E 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High 6.
